content: E N T R Y¬† ¬†C L O S E D________________________________________________Free Raffle - CS Austria Special Christmas Edition üéÑCan you here the bells ring? üîî https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Cm3AHEgM6MUPDATE:However, just for fun, anyone voting here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422131will be allowed to have another entry / total of 2 votes. There will be three winners!1st prize (last block) crypto stamp starter set (5x black stamps: CS 1, CS 2.0 honeybadger, CS 3.0 whale, CS 3.1 rhino, CS 4.0 bull)2nd price (2nd block) 1x first cryptostamp BLACK (CS 1 Austria)3rd prize (first block) 1x first cryptostamp BLACK (CS 1 Austria)More info about the CS Austria: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5153959.0Terms- Account must have positive trade feedback or must be an established Hero / Legendary account (no negative trading feedback!)- I'll take the right to exclude anyone at my own discretion (will only do so with good reasoning: rude behaviour, obvious spamming etc.)- No multis - are going to be excluded from this and any raffles in the future.- If the prize is lost in transit, there will be no replacement- Shipping will be included worldwide (untracked)!- Minimum of 7 received merit!How to participate?Just pick any available number between 00-99! Please post in the following format: "YOUR NUMBER/SPOT - YOUR USERNAME"Once full, I'll pick a Bitcoin block that has not been mined yet. The last numbers of the block hash will determine the winner. Slots:00 - minerjones01 - inthelongrun02 - sweeteye03 - Thiago007 04 - pinky123405 - 5tift06 - Danydee07 - krogoth08 - 09 - 10 - QuakerBull 11 - Mitchell12 - malevolent 13 - geo14 - mole081515 - 16 - PawGo17 - HouseOfBAMF18 - DgCarlosLeon19 - 20 - ChiBitCTy21 - The_Crypto_Kid22 - JanEmil23 - ¬†mx12.levins 24 - 25 - Fattcatt 26 - Mojo27 - 28 - bct_ail29 - 30 - Hotdog731 - 32 - 33 - dcarter 34 - Spoki51 35 - 36 - 37 - Dernoste38 - YodasRedRocket39 - ¬†Suzuki Matt 40 - bitbollo41 - BobbyCoins42 - tweetious43 - 44 - Kryme45 - 46 - 47 - 48 - NeuroticFish49 - Iced50 - pm-ict 51 - xSlyy52 - aoluain53 - 54 - digicoinuser55 - henkcryptotank56 - bullrun2020bro57 - 58 -59 - bestcoin_5960 -61 - 62 - 63 - Mauser64 - HeRetiK65 - PawGo66 - Sunny 67 - TheBeardedBaby68 - 69 - 70 - Markzellers71 - owlcatz72 - 73 - ovcijisir74 - willi997475 -76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - Mbitr 78 - wwzsocki79 - 80 - 81 - CoinageMint 82 - 83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 -86 - Remsjack87 - 88 - Buchi-8889 -90 - salad daging91 -92 - 93 - tread9394 - 95 - 96 - 97 - Doblezero98 - 99 - NeuroticFishgl & hf!
